p: Reactive oxygen species (ROS) was measured using DCFH‐DA probes. After treatment, cells were incubated with 5 μmol/L of DCFH‐DA at 37°C with 5% (v/v) CO 2 for 30 min. Subsequently, cells were washed three times with serum‐free medium, and the fluorescence intensity in cells was determined using fluorescence microscope (Olympus Optical Co., Ltd., Japan) and flow cytometry, respectively.
